```{r}
library(rio)
DataA="https://github.com/AlexSalaz142/TrabajoE2/raw/main/Data_conjunta_Alex.csv"
DataA1=import(DataA)
```

```{r}
str(DataA1)
sum(is.na(DataA1$GINIcoeff))
sum(is.na(DataA1$EduExp))
sum(is.na(DataA1$NoEmploy))
sum(is.na(DataA1$DemoIndex))
```

```{r}
Modelrl=lm(GINIcoeff~NoEmploy, DataA1)
anova(Modelrl)
summary(Modelrl)
```

```{r}
Modelrl2=lm(GINIcoeff~NoEmploy+DemoIndex, DataA1)
anova(Modelrl2)
summary(Modelrl2)
```

```{r}
Modelrl3=lm(GINIcoeff~NoEmploy+DemoIndex+EduExp, DataA1)
anova(Modelrl3)
summary(Modelrl3)
```
```{r}
library(lm.beta)
lm.beta(Modelrl3)
```

```{r}
library(stargazer)
library(jtools)
stargazer(Modelrl,Modelrl2,Modelrl3, type ="text")
plot_summs(Modelrl,Modelrl2,Modelrl3, scale = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(rio)
library(dplyr)
```


```{r}
data="https://github.com/AlexSalaz142/TrabajoE2/raw/main/data_gianfranco.csv"
dataindep=import(data,sep=";")
```
```{r}
datadep="https://github.com/AlexSalaz142/TrabajoE2/raw/main/Gini_coeff.csv"
dataGini=import(datadep,sep=";")
```

```{r}
dataGini=dataGini[-c(2, 4:7)]
```

```{r}
colnames(dataGini)[1]="country"
colnames(dataGini)[2]="gini"
```

```{r}
dataGianfranco=merge(dataindep,dataGini,all=TRUE)
```

```{r}
dataGianfranco$pop_urb=as.numeric(dataGianfranco$pop_urb)
dataGianfranco$export=as.numeric(dataGianfranco$export)
dataGianfranco$school_enr=as.numeric(dataGianfranco$school_enr)
dataGianfranco$gini=as.numeric(dataGianfranco$gini)
```

```{r}
modelG1=lm(gini~school_enr, dataGianfranco)
anova(modelG1)
summary(modelG1)
```
```{r}
modelG2=lm(gini~pop_urb+school_enr, dataGianfranco)
anova(modelG2)
summary(modelG2)
```
```{r}
modelG3=lm(gini~export+school_enr, dataGianfranco)
anova(modelG3)
summary(modelG3)
```

```{r}
library(stargazer)
library(jtools)
stargazer(modelG1, modelG2, modelG3, type ="text")
```
